testcase.classname: Validate Booking functionality and API service
testcase.name: Validate booking POST and GET request and ui filter field
testcase.system-out: Given Make booking POST request with invalid credentials....................passed And Make POST request that creates a new booking............................passed And Make GET request with booking id from made POST request.................passed When User opens index page..................................................passed And User search in the filter filed by full name............................passed Then Validate that restful booker title is present..........................passed
